originalText.text: Our 2 year old daughter attended Angel Keepers and it was a wonderful choice for her! The daycare is in a quiet building with a backyard. She was always ready and willing to go to the daycare in the morning and always had a smile on her face when we picked her up at the end of the day. The staff and owners of the program are lovely people who like children and speak them to kindly. Our daughter always came home clean, rested, and well fed. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: My son attended Angel Keepers for almost a year and he loved it! He enjoyed going to school. The owners and teachers are amazing, they took care of my son as if he was their own. My son grew physically, socially, and emotionally. He also learned so much. Communication was always open to know about his day or any concerns. Highly recommend!!

text.text: My son attended Angel Keepers for almost a year and he loved it! He enjoyed going to school. The owners and teachers are amazing, they took care of my son as if he was their own. My son grew physically, socially, and emotionally. He also learned so much. Communication was always open to know about his day or any concerns. Highly recommend!!

originalText.text: As a first time mom who was returning to work after 4 months of mat. leave choosing a daycare was the hardest decision for me but choosing Angel Keeper's was one of the best decisions i could've made. Quiet building and central location close to the train for parents that commute to work. My daughter started here at 4 months and stayed for a total of 5 1/2 months and i must say we both loved this place. From day one of bringing my daughter here she adapted pretty quickly and took to the caregivers naturally. She didn't cry at all i was actually the one crying (first time moms will understand). Her first day went so well, i was thoroughly pleased. She was the youngest baby there during her time there but she was well paid attention to and well taken care of. This place is clean, well run, and staff is very attentive and dedicated to the development of all the children. Communication with the parents was great and they did a lot of fun and educational activities with the kids. This place felt like home, so sad we couldn't stay longer but due to a split with the agency i was unable to afford their private fees. Both my daughter and i will truly miss this place.

originalText.text: I love Angel Keepers Child Care. I see my kids enjoying and so happy with the staff.  The environment is a very clean, safe  and the play area with a lot of variety learning and educational toys. We love it.

originalText.text: This daycare is wonderful! The staff is amazing I felt at peace while I was at work knowing my daughter was in great hands!! I highly recommend this daycare.
